entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 a.m. CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
